column4: Can anybody tell me how to install a windows program using wine?
and after that just give the name of the window program I want to install?
Hehe, no, WinProgram.exe was just an example.. Just 'wine Voicedit.exe' (if that's what the exe is called.)
Ok. I hope it works out. Wine can be a frustrating piece of cra---fantastic software!
Did you run 'wine "/mnt/windows/Program Files/Panasonic/Voice Editing/Voice Edit.exe"'?
I will try it now. wait
when I tried to run it i get: wine: cannot find '/mnt/windows/Program'
You need to put " " around the path to the exe.
I got this:  wine "/mnt/windows/Program Files/Panasonic/Voice Editing/voice editing.exe"
looks like that program won't immediately run under wine... Maybe you should try #wine instead... Or check out their website.
Either way, I've got to go now. Good luck with it!
